item.title: Add support for your Linux distro
item.description: This guide shows all the necessary steps to use unspported linux distribytion with Wails. if you managed to get Wails working for your desktop please consider making a Pull Request Cli reference wails ├── cmd │ ├── cmd-mewn.go │ ├── linuxdb.yaml │ ├── linux.go │ └── system.go └── README.md
